amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike a provision in title II of the bill relating to the maximum staffing level for full-time equivalent aviation screeners.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered seventeen printed in the Congressional Record to strike the proviso beginning on line 5.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 228 (Roll no. 265).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. DeFazio.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 228 (Roll no. 265).
